ch: 畢業於交通大學機械所，因熱愛程式，出社會後就轉職為軟體工程師，從使用Ruby on Rails、Docker、Javascript到現在為專職的React Native接案工程師
en: I graduated from department of Mechanical of NCTU university,I became a developer after I leave school because I found out my passion in coding,I used Ruby on Rails first,and now I am a React Native developer
